name: TinyHouse! Create your isometric interior room.
name_original: TinyHouse! Create your isometric interior room.
description:
The purpose of this "game" is to showcase the assets pack tileset which I created to sell on the Itch.io store:

https://pixel-salvaje.itch.io/isometric-interiors

Itch Store.

Here you can experiment and create your beloved tiny house and test the isometric assets which I created.

I'm a terrible "programmer", even though I made it on Gdevelop was really difficult for me to complete this project,  I appreciate a lot your feedback and bug report.

Share your new ideas to add to the project (that helps me a lot) and share your beloved TinyHouse. I would like to see your creations :)

I will be updating this project weekly by fixing code and adding new assets.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you feel to support this development you can tip me with any amount you wish. That would help me a lot to develop new ideas for TinyHouse.

 

TinyHouse Paypal

 https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/TinyHouseGame?country.x=ES&locale.x=en_US

Enjoy:) Many thanks.
